
# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Node modules (if using npm for any libraries like bootstrap or tailwind via npm)
node_modules/

# Environment variables
.env

# Build output (if you have any pre-build or generated folders)
dist/
build/

# Compressed files
*.zip
*.tar.gz

# IDE settings
.vscode/
.idea/
